!You must pass individual tests to obtain marks. The *Mark of the Scholar* is only given to those who pass the Trial of the Scholar. You must be above *level 35* to take the test. To take the Trial of the Scholar, visit *Magister Mirien in the temple of Dion Castle Town*. The *Mark of Trust* is only given to those who pass the Testimony of Trust. You must be above *level 37* to take the test. To take the Testimony of Trust, visit *High Priest Hollint at the Town of Oren*. And finally the *Mark of Witchcraft* is only given to those who pass the Test of Witchcraft. You must be above *level 39* to take the test. To take the Test of Witchcraft, go to the *Corridor of Death and visit Orim of the Shadow*. [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30115/13.htm|Return]Â
